suppress.notes: file name: GetDocument.Insider.dll Suppressing this CVE as it is a .NetCore runtime issue affecting .NetCore runtimes below .NET Core 3.1.4 or lower. The POS Runs in an AppService which will have the fixes already applied, and the global.json has been addeded to require .NetCore 3.1.408 or greater. More details can be found here: https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/156

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/175 for full MS Details on CVE. .NET Core and Visual Studio Denial of Service Vulnerability. This CVE applies to any .NET Core 3.1 but patch is provided at 3.1.405, POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/176 for full MS Details on CVE. A remote code execution vulnerability exists when parsing certain types of graphics files. This vulnerability only exists on systems running on MacOS or Linux. This CVE applies to any .NET Core 3.1 but patch is provided at 3.1.405, POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/194 for full MS Details on CVE. A denial of service vulnerability exists in .NET 5.0, .NET Core 3.1 and .NET Core 2.1 where .NET (Core) server applications providing WebSocket endpoints could be tricked into endlessly looping while trying to read a single WebSocket frame. This CVE applies to any .NET Core 3.1 but patch is provided at 3.1.412, POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/178 for full MS Details on CVE. A remote code execution vulnerability exists in .NET 5 and .NET Core due to how text encoding is performed.This vulnerability is for System.Text.Encodings.Web and fixed on 5.0.1 and we are using 5.0.1 This CVE applies to any .NET Core 3.1 but patch is provided at 3.1.407, POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/196 for full MS Details on CVE. An information disclosure vulnerability exists in .NET 5.0, .NET Core 3.1 and .NET Core 2.1 when dumps created by the tool to collect crash dumps and dumps on demand are created with global read permissions on Linux and macOS. This CVE applies to any .NET Core 3.1 but patch is provided at 3.1.412, POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/111 for MS details on this CVE. Package name: System.Text.RegularExpressions.dll (included as part of the .Net Core runtime) Vulnerable versions: 4.3.0 and below Secure versions: 4.3.1+ This CVE applies to .Net Core versions below 2.2.107 (runtime 2.2.5). POS is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 which is not vunerable, and deployed to Azure App Service which will have the security patch applied.

file name: Azure.Storage.Blobs:12.10.0 See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/111 for MS details on this CVE. Package name: Azure.Storage.Blobs (included as part of the .Net Core runtime) Vulnerable versions: 12.10.0 and below This CVE applies to .NET Core 2.1, .NET Core 1.0, .NET Core 1.1, PowerShell Core 6.0. MSI is pinned to .Net core SDK > 3.1.408 for .NET and Visual Studio Information Disclosure Vulnerability. This is a temporary suppression pending a fix being available. Bug to track the fix - https://dev.azure.com/ukhydro/Abzu/_boards/board/t/Abzu%20Delivery%20Team/Stories/?workitem=53814

file name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions.dll See https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-8409 for details on this CVE. Note: This was reanalysed by NIST on 4th October, and is now a breaking issue. Affects .NET Core 2.1 - now on .NET 6 so false positive. See https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/en-us/vulnerability/CVE-2018-8409

file name: DiscUtils.Core.dll, DiscUtils.Streams.dll For details on these CVEs see: http://web.nvd.nist.gov/view/vuln/detail?vulnId=CVE-2021-4277 This is a temporary suppression pending a fix being available. Bug to track the fix - https://dev.azure.com/ukhydro/Abzu/_boards/board/t/Abzu%20Delivery%20Team/Stories/?workitem=67185

file name: System.Private.DataContractSerialization:4.3.0 This CVE appiles to .net version >= 6.0.0 and < 6.0.12. Version 6.0.13 is not vulnerable See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/244

file name: System.Runtime.Serialization.Json:4.0.2, System.Runtime.Serialization.Json:4.3.0, System.Text.Json:4.6.0, System.Text.Json:4.7.2, System.Text.Json:7.0.0 Bug to track the fix - https://dev.azure.com/ukhydro/Abzu/_boards/board/t/Abzu%20Delivery%20Team/Stories/?workitem=71085
file name: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates:4.1.0 Bug to track fix: https://dev.azure.com/ukhydro/Abzu/_boards/board/t/Abzu%20Delivery%20Team/Stories/?workitem=74860
file name: System.Net.Http:4.3.3 False positive - applies to .NET Core 1.0, .NET Core 1.1 or .NET Core 2.0. See https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/88
